Articles.Content:
This is an idea I had which isn't really a priority or anything but maybe would be a nice thing for the future.

Just an additional tab, maybe for the administration building or mission control, which shows your space program's history. So it would mark on the timeline every time a vessel is launched, docked, landed or destroyed, as well as when flags are planted or other major events. Perhaps contracts too (and have the ability to toggle what is visible similar to map view to prevent clutter). It'd also be nice to have a graph showing funds, reputation and science over time. Again not a major thing but I think it would enhance that feeling of actually running a space program by giving you a chance to look back over your history.
This is the polish 1.0 needs. I, for one, would like to see it in the form of a signature ribbon... But that's just me.
Anyone else enjoy looking at Kerbal history in Final Frontier? Maybe it's just me. I like this idea though.
